title: Welcome!
content: This is the full Career template. It’s structured as a pipeline: Foundations → Skills → Impact → Outcomes.

title: Profile
content: Start here: summary + links. This is your entry point.

title: Foundations
content: These nodes anchor your story (education, experience, community).

title: Skills & Expertise
content: Skills grow from foundations. Your expertise becomes input to your impact.

title: Impact
content: Impact nodes represent measurable change produced by your skills.

title: Outcomes
content: Outcomes are the end results (the “so what”).

title: Explore Details
content: Click any node to open details. This is where the narrative lives.

title: Search
content: Use the Menu panel to search and highlight matching nodes.

title: Done
content: That’s it. Customize the template, then compare it to the Task Management and TaskDB views.
